verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse: 1
Staring into Your eyes
Makes my heart come alive
Suddenly brought to life
When I met You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse: 2
Reaching beyond the skies
Running deep, stretching wide
Perfect love realized
Here with You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pre Chorus:
Now this love is for real You will never let go,
Never let go
It's more than just words love beyond my control
Out of con-trol

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: This is real love, this is real love

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: This is real love, this is real love

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
You're pulling me closer and closer
holding my heart til the very end
Jesus, I'm found in Your freedom
this is real love, this is real love

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
In Your heart I am found
I want You, I want You
You won't let me down
You've got me, You've got me
